title: how to start a game
body: I am new so i'm confused about starting a game

replies.body:
First off, welcome to the community and League!

We've actually written up a really cool [**New Player Guide**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/new-player-guide) that should answer a lot of your questions about the game. Once you're in the client, you can jump into a game using the **PLAY** button in the top-left before you'll be greeted with the Game Modes available. I'd recommend playing a lot of Co-Op VS. AI matches under *Beginner* before you start hopping into *Intermediate* matches and eventually, into PvP.

Please reply to this post if you have any other questions, I'd be happy to address any that I can. ^.^
http://imgur.com/a/TY43c
